title: Generate a lunch poll
prompt: I am planning to send a Slack message to my team in a channel. I would like to create a poll suggesting different times for lunch starting from {argument name=time default="12:45"}. The options should be defined by one emoji related to food (always different for each option) and a time, like "- üçî 12:45". The message should be fun and friendly, also using emojis. Use British English language for the output.
